title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: The gathering pipe on LochnagarIs sounding lang and clearly.

title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: FroAvning far and dark above Balmoral, aAvay- at the head of GlenGelder, AA'ith yawning ravines and beetling precipices, round Avhich theeagle sails and the storms of winter roar, rises the great mountain ofLochnagar.

title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: Southward, it reaches over the summit of Lochnagar; and aAvay up there, among the mountains by Loch Muick side,nestles the little Glas Alt Shiel, Avhere many a happy day of freedomhas been spent by Prince Albert and the Queen.
